definition: the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, but I get up late as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中秋節，但我還是一如往常的晚起。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Day is on the August 15th of the lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: “中秋節”是在農曆八月十五這一天。

sentences.english: Would you and Lily like to come over to my home for Mid-Autumn Festival?
sentences.chinese: 你和莉莉希望過來到我家過中秋節嗎？

sentences.english: And Yuantong Express raised price again during mid Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 今年中秋節前，圓通速運也再次調價。

sentences.english: The day after tomorrow, we will be celebrating the traditional Chinese holiday, the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 再過兩天，就是一年一度的中國傳統佳節中秋節。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the Mid-Autumn Festival is no class, so the sleep time.
sentences.chinese: 幸好中秋節不用上課，於是有了補眠的時候。

sentences.english: And the moon is what this celebration is all about.
sentences.chinese: 而月亮正是中秋節慶祝的主題。

sentences.english: Mid- Autumn Festival and Spring Festival are special festivals in China.
sentences.chinese: 中秋節和春節是中國特別的節日。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival celebrations date back to more than 2,000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 慶祝中秋節可以向前追溯到2000多年前。

sentences.english: Since then, the custom of Mid-Autumn Festival worship in private spread.
sentences.chinese: 從此，中秋節拜月的風俗在民間傳開了。

sentences.english: To conclude the Midde-Autumn Festival is a very nice festival for Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 最後，中秋節對中國人來說是個非常好的節日。

sentences.english: The Mid-autumn Festival, one of the reunion holidays for Chinese families, fell on September 12th.
sentences.chinese: 中秋節，一箇中國閤家團圓的假日，落在9月12日。

sentences.english: My experience at the MID – AUTUM FESTIVAL has been amazing.
sentences.chinese: 我在中秋節的經驗是極之美好。

sentences.english: Some families have dinner in the open(air)on Mid-Autunm Festival.
sentences.chinese: 有些人家中秋節那天在戶外喫飯。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival is on the fifteenth day of the August, chinese calendar.

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
